modName: Psychosteves Bust of the Gray Fox
summary: Just a simple texture replacement mod for the Bust of the Gray fox
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/5763-1-1329526333.jpg [/img]

[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[b] [color=#4ea2e5] Psychosteve's Bust of the Gray Fox [/color][/b] [b] | V 1.2 [/b]
[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Just a simple texture replacement mod for the Bust of the Gray fox.

The texture is based on the [color=#ffe292]512 x512[/color] original one but with more details.

Enjoy !!




[b] [color=#fbaf37] What's in the box ?? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
3 colors :

[*] bright marble

[*] gray marble

[*] dark marble


4 effects :

[*] shiny normal map

[*] less shiny normal map

[*] grainy/shiny normal map

[*] less grainy/shiny normal map
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Install [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/ target="_blank"] Nexus Mod Manager[/url] and follow the steps to install the options you want.

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Use the manual install package ([color=#ffe292]instructions inside[/color])
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Uninstall [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Just uninstall the mod with [color=#ffe292] Nexus Mod Manager [/color]

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Manually delete all content in the [color=#ffe292] Data/textures/clutter/grayfoxbust [/color] folder
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Want more ? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Don't forget to check out my other mods :

[list]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4707 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's DragonPriest Masks [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6538 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Golden God's Shrines [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4640 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Stone of Barenziah [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9868 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Custom Realistic Lighting [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11010 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's SkyUI icon Set [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7699 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Horse Whistle sound [/url]
[/list]
author: Psychosteve
